text: Bioenergy Sorghum Compendium The proposed YR4 studies will add new information from RNA sequencing profiles on N remobilization responses to water deficit ABA stem growth regulation stem composition roots of field grown bioenergy sorghum and juvenile phase tissues.

Genome Sequencing of NERREPTERM sativus an important fungal pathogen of cereal crops NERREPTERM Economic importance and relevance to NERREPTERM agriculture C sativus causes NERREPTERM economically important diseases in barley and wheat spot blotch common root rot and black point.
